sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"利益，好处"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: advantage, benefit, interest, favour, profit, gain
means: advantage ：指因某方面占优势或利用某机会以及对方弱点而获得利益与好处。
benefit ：普通用词，指通过正当手段从物质或精神方面得到的任何好处或利益。
interest ：作"利益"解时，多用复数形式，既可指集团、群体的利益，又可指个人的利益。
favour ：指在竞争中获得的advantage,也可指在狭隘的个人利益。
profit ：着重收益，尤指从物质、钱财等方面获得的利益。
gain ：指获得的物质利益，也暗示不损坏他人利益而得的无形好处。

sentence.Network_en: I want to take advantage of your lifetime of scholarship.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望能够用到您一生的学识。

sentence.Network_en: She took advantage of him even after they were divorced.
sentence.Network_cn: 甚至在他们离婚后，她还在占他的便宜。

sentence.Network_en: The government have not been able to turn today'sdemonstration to their advantage.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府未能把今天的游行示威转为己用。

jx.jx_en_mean: (或 to one's advantage)handle or respond to something in such a way as to benefit from it
To put to good use; avail oneself of

lj.lj_ly: take advantage of all educational opportunities.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 占…的便宜：自私地获利；剥削
有利：产生良好效果；有利于

lj.lj_ly: The roses were displayed to advantage in a blue vase.
lj.lj_ls: 玫瑰插在蓝色的花瓶中，产生了良好的效果

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French avantage, from avant 'in front', from late Latin abante (see advance)

entry.tran: 有利条件；有利因素；优势
entry.def: An advantage is something that puts you in a better position than other people.

example.ex: They are deliberately flouting the law in order to obtain an advantage over their competitors...
example.tran: 他们为了和竞争对手抢夺先机而公然无视法律。

example.ex: A good crowd will be a definite advantage to me and the rest of the team.
example.tran: 大批观众无疑将成为我和其他队员的一大优势。

entry.def: Advantage is the state of being in a better position than others who are competing against you.

example.ex: Men have created a social and economic position of advantage for themselves over women.
example.tran: 男性已经为自己创造了优于女性的社会和经济上的有利地位。

entry.def: An advantage is a way in which one thing is better than another.

example.ex: The great advantage of home-grown oranges is their magnificent flavour...
example.tran: 家产柑橘的一大好处是口感极佳。

example.ex: This custom-built kitchen has many advantages over a standard one.
example.tran: 这间定制的厨房与标准厨房相比存在诸多优点。

entry.def: If you take advantage of something, you make good use of it while you can.

example.ex: I intend to take full advantage of this trip to buy the things we need.
example.tran: 我打算充分利用这次旅行来购买我们所需的物品。

entry.def: If someone takes advantage of you, they treat you unfairly for their own benefit, especially when you are trying to be kind or to help them.

example.ex: She took advantage of him even after they were divorced.
example.tran: 甚至在他们离婚后，她还在占他的便宜。

entry.tran: （尤指转变不利情况使之）对…有利
entry.def: If you use or turn something to your advantage, you use it in order to benefit from it, especially when it might be expected to harm or damage you.

example.ex: The government have not been able to turn today's demonstration to their advantage.
example.tran: 政府未能把今天的游行示威转为己用。

entry.tran: 最有利地；最有效地；使优点突出
entry.def: If something is shown to good advantage or to best advantage, it is shown in a way that reveals its best features.

example.ex: The walls were painted in muted tones to show the pictures to good advantage.
example.tran: 墙面被漆成了淡色调，以突出照片。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of having a superior or more favorable position;

sentences.sentence: "the experience gave him the advantage over me"

means.word_mean: 3. benefit resulting from some event or action;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

Sentence.sentence: A new technology is unlikely to take the place of an old one without a clear advantage.

The ability to draw upon every available tool and insight—picked up from science, arts, and technology—to solve the problems of the future, and take advantage of the opportunities that present themselves, will be helpful to them and the United States
One additional advantage of the interactive digital textbook is that students can download relevant critical comments.
Mothers are far more likely than fathers to take advantage of this law,But extended leaves and part-time employment are known to be harmful to careers—for both genders

However,while talking is largely subconscious and rapid, writing is deliberate and slow, Over time,writers took advantage of this and started crafting long-winded sentences such as this one:The whole engagement lasted above 12 hours, till the gradual retreat of the Persians was changed into a disorderly flight, of which the shameful example was given by the principal leaders and……" No one talks like that casually — or should

means.word_mean: 有利条件, 有利因素, 优势

sentences.en: Her Olimpic experience gave her a big advantage over the other contestants for the final victory.
sentences.cn: 她的奥运会参赛经历使她比起其他竞技对手在争取最后获胜上具有很大的优势。

sentences.en: There are advantages to not having servants.
sentences.cn: 不用仆人有不用仆人的优越性。

means.word_mean: 有利于，有益于，有助于；促进，推动；使处于有利地位

sentences.en: It would advantage you to work hard.

jushi.english: She was always at an advantage in arguments.
Do your disadvantages outweigh the advantages?
